contents.item: You need to see time correctly for you not to waste your life
There is no communication with God without communication with God’s people
Make sure everything you do is targeted at yielding maximum results
A job should only be a stepping stone to being your own boss
Discovering yourself is the major key to being successful
Effectiveness in life is a measure of how many products you are able to produce in life
Joblessness opens the door for greater opportunities
Living a fruitful and purposeful life has eternal blessings
Life is all about discovery
Your gift or calling enables you to ask the question of what to do
Control yourself every passing second and make sure that no unit of time is being wasted
The ability to be intense in whatever you do is a key factor in reclaiming your lost years
It is our responsibility as believers to bring the will of God to the people
Life should be measured with product
Joblessness is a rare privilege
Maximize the time you have through hard work, concentration and research
All products come from the worth of time
You have to be skillful in your time management to be effective in life
Our fellowship is with God and His people
It’ll never be too late to start to make use of the time you still have left
Reveal to the people and make them experience God first before you make them church members
You can discover your calling through the eyes of others
The doctrine of waiting for confirmation is one of the greatest time killers
To convert a day is to produce a product
To be productive, effective and to live a life of understanding and wisdom is not to waste time
You need to invest time in understanding and discovering yourself
You can achieve great things by utilizing your God-given talent
Your calling multiplies you
Time is wasted when it is not being converted
The greatest dilemma man has to face is figuring out what to do with his time
Money is a compensation for time spent
Be conscious about life and time in order to maximize your time effectively
The only need of God is in people
We glorify God only as we celebrate people
Life is fulfilling when you are being productive
Everything is a product of time because it took a particular period of time to achieve that result
Everything good you see is a product of time well spent
Time is the greatest wealth
Joblessness gives you liberty
You shouldn’t live for yourself alone but you must also learn to live the Christian life
The idea of life is maximizing your time and living and effective life
The life in our possession is our time
Losing your job is an awesome opportunity to look inside yourself and make new discoveries
Work is an instrument through which you carry out your life mandate
Time produces quality product
We were all created differently, each with his/her calling and purpose
The primary thing that determines how effective your life is how you carry out your calling
We glorify God when we appreciate humans
To help people is to help God
Always explore new opportunities and ideas, you never know which will work for you
Intensity is the extreme application of force and strength
When you invest in life, you are being fruitful and productive
Joblessness sets you free
Being dynamic doesn’t necessarily mean you live an effective life
A busy life is not necessarily an effective life
You cannot understand God without understanding people
God is waiting on you to believe that you are capable
Employment is the greatest dream killer
Be eager to explore new discoveries
To maximize time is to make sure that every second, minute and hour counts
Life becomes a dilemma when you are living a purposeless and goalless life
Don’t equate effective living to being busy
Your calling is concealed in you and has to be discovered by you alone
Time wasters are life wasters
Covert your time for discovery
Don’t waste your youthful and active days on employment
We have to consciously monitor and maximize our time effectively and efficiently
Love for people is the basis of our fellowship with God
Joblessness brings you face to face with destiny
Don’t make your job your permanent assignment. Rather, make your work your permanent assignment
No amount of money can compensate losing your purpose
Money is a product of time
We glorify God when we encourage and bless His creation
The service of God is in people
You need intensity to be quick
Time is the content of life
Understand the concept of time and find ways to maximize it effectively
Don’t let your society and environment dictate what you do with your time
Appreciate and find ways to invest in yourself
Your net worth determines how valuable you are in the sight of men
Make optimum use of every second that passes daily
Our fellowship with people brings us closer to the Kingdom
Gain great values by converting your time
Always celebrate people for who they are
It is impossible to pause, stop or delay time
Effectiveness of life should be measured by the results in the area of your calling or purpose
Be fearless in releasing the productivity of your time
Our goal in life is to bring the Kingdom of God to people and help change their lives
Being rich or famous does not equate an effective life
Man is the carrier of God’s image
